aka: 乐高星球大战：重建银河系 衍生剧

writer.name: 丹·埃尔南德斯 Dan Hernandez

this_title: Lego Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy - Pieces of the Past
trans_title: 乐高星球大战：重建银河系-失落的碎片
乐高星球大战：重建银河系 衍生剧
introduction: The Lego Star Wars animated sequel is a continuation of the story that began in 2024 with Rebuild the Galaxy. In the series, a new threat rises in the galaxy, and Sig Greebling and Darth Dev must combine their powers of Force Building and Sith Breaking to stop it. Alongside Jedi Bob, Yesi Scala and Servo, they will journey into the deepest corners of Lego Star Wars lore, uncovering pieces of all the galaxies that have come before.
chinese_title: 乐高星球大战：重建银河系-失落的碎片
foreign_title: Lego Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy - Pieces of the Past
